item.text: Motion by Senator Thune to recommit to Senate Committee on Armed Services with instructions to report back forthwith with the following amendment (SA 3866) made in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by motion.
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 13. Record Vote Number: 503. (CR S6054)
Motion to proceed to measure considered in Senate. (CR S6050)
Motion to proceed to measure considered in Senate. (CR S5989)
Cloture on the motion to proceed to the measure invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 14. Record Vote Number: 500. (CR S5544)
Motion to proceed to measure considered in Senate. (CR S5539)
Cloture motion on the motion to proceed to the measure presented in Senate. (CR S5522: 4)
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure made in Senate. (CR S5522)
An errata sheet on written report No. 119-39 was printed.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 115.

item.title: Military Construction Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2026

item.titleType: Short Title(s) as Reported to Senate
item.title: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2026

An original bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2026 for military activities of the Department of Defense, for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

amendment.purpose: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on casualty assistance and long-term care programs.

latestAction.text: Considered by Senate. (consideration: CR S6512: 3)

amendedBill.title: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2026

amendedAmendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

item.text: Amendment SA 3427 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 3748. (consideration: CR S6312-6314) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on casualty assistance and long-term care programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3427 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 3748.

latestAction.text: Motion by Senator Thune to recommit to Senate Committee on Armed Services with instructions to report back forthwith with the following amendment (SA 3866) made in Senate.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
